text: Bounds Green tube station is a London Underground station. It is at the junction of Bounds Green Road and Brownlow Road, in North London. The station is on the Piccadilly Line, between Wood Green and Arnos Grove stations. It is on the boundary between Travelcard Zone 3 and Zone 4. ==References== ==Other websites== * London Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Railway stations opened in 1932 Category:Charles Holden buildings Category:1932 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1930s establishments in England Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Haringey
title: Bounds Green tube station
